database

Class DatabaseWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.DatabaseAccessor
      • database.DatabaseWriter

  • public class DatabaseWriter
extends DatabaseAccessor
    Provides methods to update data or add new data to a database. Read and write access.
    Author:
    Andi Gu

    • Method Detail

      • getStudentCourseAssociationId

        private int getStudentCourseAssociationId(java.lang.String courseId,
                                java.lang.String teacherId,
                                java.lang.String studentId)
                                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Gets the primary key of the row in the student_course_association table containing the given course code, teacher number, and student number. Helper function for functions needing the student_course_association_id in order to update data about it. Usages: updateMark function.
        Parameters:
        courseId - Code of the course to be found.
        teacherId - The teacher number of the teacher to be found.
        studentId - The student number of the student to be found.
        Returns:
        The primary key of the row in student_course_association with the given information
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • updateMark

        public void updateMark(StudentCourseAssociation studentCourseAssociation,
              AssessmentMark mark)
                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Updates the data from the given AssessmentMark into the database, if it's already in the database. If not, it adds the data from the AssessmentMark into the database.
        Parameters:
        studentCourseAssociation - The studentCourseAssociation object that the mark belongs to
        mark - The AssessmentMark object containing the data to be added or updated
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • addAssessment

        public void addAssessment(Assessment assessment,
                 Course course)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Adds the data from the Assessment into the database.
        Parameters:
        assessment - Assessment object containing the data to be added
        course - Course object that the assessment belongs to
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • updateAssessment

        public void updateAssessment(java.lang.String oldName,
                    Assessment assessment,
                    Course course)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        Updates the data from the Assessment in the database. Must be separated from the addAssessment function because there is a chance that the name was changed, which is the primary key of assessment in the table.
        Parameters:
        oldName - The old name of the assessment to be updated. Required because it's the primary key of the assessment and is needed to find the correct row to update
        assessment - The Assessment object containing the data to be updated
        course - The Course object that the assessment belongs to
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • setClubs

        public void setClubs(Student student,
            int clubs)
              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Updates the number of clubs a student is a member of in the database
        Parameters:
        student - The Student object to be updated
        clubs - The new number of clubs for the Student object
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • setVolunteerHours

        public void setVolunteerHours(Student student,
                     int volunteerHours)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Updates the number of volunteer hours a student has acquired in the database
        Parameters:
        student - The Student object to be updated
        volunteerHours - The new number of volunteer hours for the Student object
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • setLates

        public void setLates(StudentCourseAssociation courseAssociation,
            int lates)
              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Updates the number of lates a student has in the database
        Parameters:
        courseAssociation - The StudentCourseAssociation object to be updated (because lates are per course, not per student)
        lates - The new number of lates for the StudentCourseAssociation object
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • setAbsences

        public void setAbsences(StudentCourseAssociation courseAssociation,
               int absences)
                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Updates the number of absences a student has in the database
        Parameters:
        courseAssociation - The StudentCourseAssociation object to be updated (because absences are per course, not per student)
        absences - The new number of absences for the StudentCourseAssociation object
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
